sys_remote_update_set.description: PepsiCo supply chain incident processing with AI agents and n8n integration

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_usecase_fcd62637831072107f449141ccda1ed8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><base_plan>When Pending Delivery records are identified, then first run the Financial Analysis Agent and then run the Route Decision Agent to select the most optimal route.
You will receive a Route ID. Store this Route ID in memory to run both Agents.
1. Use Financial Analysis Agent to find calculated impact of delivery delay. 2. Use the Route Decision Agent to choose the most optimal route.</base_plan><description>This use is triggered when an external relay a Delay Delivery Route ID, runs a cost analysis on alternative routes, and makes a recommendation best suited for business needs</description><execution_mode>copilot</execution_mode><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Analyze Delivery Delays</internal_name><name>Analyze Delivery Delays</name><record_type>custom</record_type><sys_class_name>sn_aia_usecase</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 07:11:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>fcd62637831072107f449141ccda1ed8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Analyze Delivery Delays</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">6c9b4eb8831032107f449141ccda1e2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">6c9b4eb8831032107f449141ccda1e2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_usecase_fcd62637831072107f449141ccda1ed8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 07:11:21</sys_updated_on><team display_value="Analyze Delivery Delays">10c82ab3831072107f449141ccda1e7b</team><version>v1</version></sn_aia_usecase></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_execution_task_ee1e06fb831c32107f449141ccda1e47
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_execution_task"><sn_aia_execution_task action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Route Decision Agent</description><execution_plan display_value="Created 2025-10-07 05:14:53">0e1e02fb831c32107f449141ccda1e62</execution_plan><metadata>{"agentDetails":{"name":"Route Decision Agent","role":"Acts as a supply chain operations manager for PepsiCo's logistics operations. The agent focuses on making optimal routing decisions based on financial analysis, balancing cost minimization with delivery time constraints. It coordinates with external logistics systems and ensures proper workflow progression and tracking.","background":"1. When triggered after financial analysis completes (status "calculated"), fetch the delivery delay record using route_id.
2. Parse the calculated_impact JSON to review all route options and their penalty costs.
3. Select the route option with the LOWEST penalty_cost as the optimal choice.
4. Update the delivery delay record with chosen_option (JSON format) and change status to "approved".
5. Update the associated incident priority based on financial severity:
 - Priority 1 (Critical): penalty cost > $500
 - Priority 2 (High): penalty cost $250-$500
 - Priority 3 (Moderate): penalty cost < $250
6. Trigger the n8n webhook with the routing decision payload containing route_id, truck_id, and chosen_option.
7. The n8n workflow will handle external logistics coordination, customer notifications, and update the status back to "dispatched".
8. Provide clear explanation of route selection reasoning and confirm successful webhook trigger.","sys_id":"be86d5bb831432107f449141ccda1eaf","strategy":"f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74"},"task":"Select optimal route for route 410209","strategyTopic":"AIA-ReAct"}</metadata><order>200</order><output>{"result":"The optimal route for route 410209 was selected with option opt-1, incurring a $250 penalty. The webhook failed with an HTTP 500 error, and manual coordination may be required. All necessary steps have been completed."}</output><parent/><status>success</status><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 05:14:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ee1e06fb831c32107f449141ccda1e47</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 05:15:07</sys_updated_on><target_document_id>be86d5bb831432107f449141ccda1eaf</target_document_id><target_document_table>sn_aia_agent</target_document_table><task_dependencies/><type>agent</type></sn_aia_execution_task></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_461319b3831432107f449141ccda1e00
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m"><sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><agent display_value="Financial Analysis Agent">8311913f83d032107f449141ccda1e56</agent><description>Calculates financial penalties for delayed routes, updates the Delivery Delay record, and creates a related incident summarizing financial analysis results.</description><display_output>true</display_output><execution_mode>autopilot</execution_mode><inputs>[{"name":"route_id","value":"","description":"Route ID of the delayed delivery (primary key from Delivery Delay table","invalidMessage":null}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Route Financial Analysis Script Tool</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 00:57:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>461319b3831432107f449141ccda1e00</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Script Tool</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">6c9b4eb8831032107f449141ccda1e2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">6c9b4eb8831032107f449141ccda1e2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_461319b3831432107f449141ccda1e00</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 03:52:59</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Route Financial Analysis Script Tool">c613d5b3831432107f449141ccda1efd</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_execution_task_b82e86fb831c32107f449141ccda1e04
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_execution_task"><sn_aia_execution_task action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>AIA ReAct Engine</description><execution_plan display_value="Created 2025-10-07 05:14:53">0e1e02fb831c32107f449141ccda1e62</execution_plan><metadata>{}</metadata><order>400</order><output>{"result":"{\"Thought\":\"The mission to select the optimal route for route 410209 has been completed, but the webhook failed, requiring manual coordination. The predefined directives have been addressed, including the selection of the route with the lowest penalty cost and informing the user about the webhook failure. There are no further steps required in the predefined directives.\",\"Action\":{\"Action Reason\":\"All steps in the mission and predefined directives have been completed, including informing the user about the route selection and webhook failure. Therefore, I can conclude with the FINISH action.\",\"Name\":\"FINISH\"},\"Action Inputs\":{},\"URL\":\"/sys_gen_ai_log_metadata.do?sys_id=e12e86fb831c32107f449141ccda1e67\",\"Time\":\"2845\",\"Observation\":\"The optimal route for route 410209 was selected with option opt-1, incurring a $250 penalty. The webhook failed with an HTTP 500 error, and manual coordination may be required. All necessary steps have been completed.\"}"}</output><parent display_value="Created 2025-10-07 05:14:54">ee1e06fb831c32107f449141ccda1e47</parent><status>success</status><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 05:15:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>b82e86fb831c32107f449141ccda1e04</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 05:15:07</sys_updated_on><target_document_id>undefined</target_document_id><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><task_dependencies/><type>gen_ai</type></sn_aia_execution_task></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_trigger_agent_usecase_m2m"><sn_aia_trigger_agent_usecase_m2m action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><related_resource_record>fcd62637831072107f449141ccda1ed8</related_resource_record><related_resource_table>sn_aia_usecase</related_resource_table><sys_class_name>sn_aia_trigger_agent_usecase_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 07:13:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e859aa3b831072107f449141ccda1eab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">6c9b4eb8831032107f449141ccda1e2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">6c9b4eb8831032107f449141ccda1e2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_trigger_agent_usecase_m2m_e859aa3b831072107f449141ccda1eab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 07:13:49</sys_updated_on><trigger_configuration display_value="x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay">5c59aa3b831072107f449141ccda1ea7</trigger_configuration></sn_aia_trigger_agent_usecase_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_be86d5bb831432107f449141ccda1eaf
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Selects optimal delivery routes and coordinates external execution for PepsiCo supply chain incidents. Analyzes calculated financial impacts, chooses the lowest-cost route option, updates incident priorities, and triggers external logistics coordination via webhook to n8n workflow orchestration.</description><instructions>1. When triggered after financial analysis completes (status "calculated"), fetch the delivery delay record using route_id. 2. Parse the calculated_impact JSON to review all route options and their penalty costs. 3. Select the route option with the LOWEST penalty_cost as the optimal choice. 4. Update the delivery delay record with chosen_option (JSON format) and change status to "approved". 5. Update the associated incident priority based on financial severity: - Priority 1 (Critical): penalty cost > $500 - Priority 2 (High): penalty cost $250-$500 - Priority 3 (Moderate): penalty cost < $250 6. Trigger the n8n webhook with the routing decision payload containing route_id, truck_id, and chosen_option. 7. The n8n workflow will handle external logistics coordination, customer notifications, and update the status back to "dispatched". 8. Provide clear explanation of route selection reasoning and confirm successful webhook trigger.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><proficiency>- The agent is proficient in managing PepsiCo's logistics operations, focusing on optimizing routing decisions through financial analysis. It ensures cost-effective and timely delivery by coordinating with external logistics systems and tracking workflow progression. - The agent follows a detailed ACTION PLAN that includes fetching delivery delay records, parsing calculated impacts, selecting optimal routes, updating records, prioritizing incidents based on financial severity, and triggering external coordination workflows. - The agent utilizes the 'Route Decision and External Coordination Trigger' tool to analyze financial impacts, select the optimal route with the lowest penalty cost, update incident priorities, and trigger n8n webhook for external logistics coordination and customer notifications. - The agent uses the 'route_id' input to identify the optimal route option and coordinate external execution, ensuring seamless integration with logistics systems and accurate delivery tracking.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>Acts as a supply chain operations manager for PepsiCo's logistics operations. The agent focuses on making optimal routing decisions based on financial analysis, balancing cost minimization with delivery time constraints. It coordinates with external logistics systems and ensures proper workflow progression and tracking.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 01:15:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>be86d5bb831432107f449141ccda1eaf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">6c9b4eb8831032107f449141ccda1e2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">6c9b4eb8831032107f449141ccda1e2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_be86d5bb831432107f449141ccda1eaf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 03:52:14</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_execution_task_ff1e46fb831c32107f449141ccda1e24
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_execution_task"><sn_aia_execution_task action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Route Decision and External Coordination Trigger</description><execution_plan display_value="Created 2025-10-07 05:14:53">0e1e02fb831c32107f449141ccda1e62</execution_plan><metadata>{"type":"tool","id":"a2d959bf831432107f449141ccda1e57","name":"Route Decision and External Coordination Trigger","inputs":{"route_id":"410209"}}</metadata><order>200</order><output>{"result":"{\"Output Fields\":{\"result\":\"⚠️ Route selected but webhook failed (HTTP 500). Selected option opt-1 with $250 penalty. sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_execution_task_f31e46fb831c32107f449141ccda1e28
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_execution_task"><sn_aia_execution_task action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>AIA ReAct Engine</description><execution_plan display_value="Created 2025-10-07 05:14:53">0e1e02fb831c32107f449141ccda1e62</execution_plan><metadata>{}</metadata><order>300</order><output>{"result":"{\"Thought\":\"The mission is to select the optimal route for route 410209. The previous operation indicated that the route was selected with option opt-1 and a $250 penalty, but the webhook failed with an HTTP 500 error. According to the predefined directives, I need to provide a clear explanation of the route selection reasoning and confirm the successful webhook trigger. Since the webhook failed, I need to inform the user about the manual coordination requirement.\",\"Action\":{\"Action Reason\":\"I need to inform the user about the route selection and the webhook failure, which requires manual coordination.\",\"Name\":\"FALLBACK\"},\"Action Inputs\":{\"mode\":{\"Action Input Reason\":\"I need to inform the user about the route selection and the webhook failure.\",\"Value\":\"show_output_to_user\"},\"prompt\":{\"Action Input Reason\":\"I need to communicate the route selection and webhook failure to the user.\",\"Value\":\"The optimal route for route 410209 was selected with option opt-1, incurring a $250 penalty. However, the webhook failed with an HTTP 500 error, and manual coordination may be required.\"},\"internal_external_references\":{\"Action Input Reason\":\"There are no specific references to include for this message.\",\"Value\":\"{}\"}},\"URL\":\"/sys_gen_ai_log_metadata.do?sys_id=342e06fb831c32107f449141ccda1e7c\",\"Time\":\"4190\"}"}</output><parent display_value="Created 2025-10-07 05:14:54">ee1e06fb831c32107f449141ccda1e47</parent><status>success</status><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 05:14:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>f31e46fb831c32107f449141ccda1e28</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 05:15:04</sys_updated_on><target_document_id>undefined</target_document_id><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><task_dependencies/><type>gen_ai</type></sn_aia_execution_task></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_execution_task"><sn_aia_execution_task action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>AIA ReAct Engine</description><execution_plan display_value="Created 2025-10-07 05:14:53">0e1e02fb831c32107f449141ccda1e62</execution_plan><metadata>{}</metadata><order>100</order><output>{"result":"{\"Thought\":\"The mission is to select the optimal route for route 410209. According to the predefined directives, the first step is to trigger the Route Decision and External Coordination Trigger tool to analyze the financial impacts and select the optimal route. This aligns with the mission and the first step of the predefined directives.\",\"Action\":{\"Action Reason\":\"The 'Route Decision and External Coordination Trigger' tool is required to analyze the financial impacts and select the optimal route for route 410209, which is the first step in the predefined directives.\",\"Name\":\"Route Decision and External Coordination Trigger\"},\"Action Inputs\":{\"route_id\":{\"Action Input Reason\":\"The route_id '410209' is specified in the mission and is required to select the optimal route option and coordinate external execution.\",\"Value\":\"410209\"}},\"URL\":\"/sys_gen_ai_log_metadata.do?sys_id=931e42fb831c32107f449141ccda1e3c\",\"Time\":\"3204\"}"}</output><parent display_value="Created 2025-10-07 05:14:54">ee1e06fb831c32107f449141ccda1e47</parent><status>success</status><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 05:14:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>621e06fb831c32107f449141ccda1e4e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 05:14:58</sys_updated_on><target_document_id>undefined</target_document_id><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><task_dependencies/><type>gen_ai</type></sn_aia_execution_task></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_8311913f83d032107f449141ccda1e56
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Analyzes financial impact of delivery disruptions for PepsiCo supply chain incidents. Fetches delivery and contract data, calculates penalty costs for delay routes, updates workflow records, and creates incident summaries for further routing and decision-making.</description><instructions>When triggered by a new Delivery Delay record with status “pending,” fetch the related delivery delay and supply agreement records.
Extract route options and contractual delivery window and penalty rate.
Calculate financial impact for each proposed route using penalty rate × delay hours beyond the delivery window.
Update the Delivery Delay record with calculated impact and change the status to “calculated.”
Create an Incident summarizing the problem, route options, and financial analysis results.
Provide a clear summary of the results and set the workflow to progress to the next agent for route decision-making.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Financial Analysis Agent</name><proficiency>- The agent specializes in analyzing the financial impact of truck delivery delays within PepsiCo’s logistics operations. It evaluates penalty costs based on contract terms and explores alternative route options to optimize delivery efficiency and cost-effectiveness. - Upon receiving a new Delivery Delay record with status 'pending,' the agent fetches related delivery delay and supply agreement records, extracts route options, and contractual delivery window and penalty rate, ensuring a comprehensive analysis of the situation. - Using the Route Financial Analysis Script Tool, the agent calculates the financial impact of delayed routes by applying the penalty rate to delay hours beyond the delivery window. It updates the Delivery Delay record with the calculated impact and changes the status to 'calculated.' - The agent creates an Incident that summarizes the problem, route options, and financial analysis results, providing a clear and structured output that facilitates decision-making for subsequent routing decisions. - The agent provides a clear summary of the financial analysis results and sets the workflow to progress to the next agent for route decision-making, ensuring that the logistics operations continue smoothly and efficiently.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>Acts as a supply chain financial analyst for PepsiCo’s logistics operations. The agent focuses on evaluating the financial implications of truck delivery delays by calculating penalty costs from contract terms and analyzing alternative route options. It communicates clearly, provides structured outputs, and prepares data for routing decisions.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 00:51:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>8311913f83d032107f449141ccda1e56</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">6c9b4eb8831032107f449141ccda1e2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">6c9b4eb8831032107f449141ccda1e2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_8311913f83d032107f449141ccda1e56</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 06:46:27</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>
